Module Breakout
Package breakout.walls

Class Wall

java.lang.Object
breakout.walls.Wall
public class Wall extends Object
This class makes the wall and initialized the ball and level

  • Constructor Details

    • Wall

      public Wall(Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio, Point ballPos)
      Wall Constructor

      creates a wall of bricks, set level to zero, make ball and make the paddle

      set the speed of the ball and draw the paddle

      Parameters:
      drawArea - the area of the wall
      brickCount - the amount bricks
      lineCount - the number of layers of bricks
      brickDimensionRatio - the Dimension of each brick
      ballPos - ball starting coordinate
